title: Siberian Cut
resume: Sean Vann is an American Logger with a plan -- a big plan. He's  worked in the Russian forestry industry for the last seventeen  years...but he's always been working for a boss. Now Sean is putting everything on the line for the opportunity  of a lifetime in deepest Siberia. He has a 3-month contract to cut  wood, set up his own operation and become master of his own destiny.
